author: gregor
msg: Made forms editor scroll to editing position after pressing "edit". This fixes http://issues.apache.org/bugzilla/show_bug.cgi?id=33731 (Thanks to Thomas Comiotto for the patch)

author: rdonkin
msg: Documentation for change ObjectToStringConverter to make context available and to make options available from context. This is an alternative way to address the needs of Issue 33331.
